pages.text: A corrupting substance that spreads like a plague, consuming all blocks of a specific type. Created using the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_consumption)Sigil of Consumption$().

pages.title: Spreading Mechanics
pages.text: $(bold)Conversion:$()$(br)AntiLife spreads to adjacent blocks of the same type as the original converted block.$(br2)$(bold)LP Cost:$()$(br)Each spread consumes LP from the player who created it (configurable).$(br2)$(bold)Range:$()$(br)Spreads up to 8 blocks from the origin (configurable with the sigil).

pages.title: Decay System
pages.text: $(bold)Breaking AntiLife:$()$(br)When any AntiLife block is broken, it triggers a decay chain reaction.$(br2)$(li)All adjacent AntiLife blocks start decaying$(li)Decay spreads to other AntiLife$(li)Decayed blocks are removed$(br2)This prevents infinite expansion and allows cleanup.$(br2)$(bold)Protected Blocks:$() Cannot convert blocks tagged $(#)animus:disallow_antilife$().
